version_description: Fixed an issue on the dashboard that could hide all of the cameras on zoom.
Added preliminary support for H264 camera streams
Added preliminary support for RTSP cameras
Support and bug fixes for iOS 13

IPCams is back with a UI refresh including a redesigned dashboard view and a new immersive full screen mode! This release also includes some major under the hood enhancements that will help support many new features to come. Want to join the conversation on what's next for IPCams? Check out the feature requests link in the settings tab.

IPCams is back with a UI refresh including a redesigned dashboard view and a new immersive full screen mode! This release also includes some major under the hood enhancements that will help support many new features to come. Want to join the conversation on what's next for IPCams? Check out the feature requests link in the settings tab.

IPCams 2.0 is here! Version 2.0 brings some great new features such as:
• Support for iOS 14
• Home screen shortcut widgets
• Improved audio handling & muting
• Full screen mode enhancements

IPCams 2.0 also introduces IPCams Pro, an optional add on to enhance your IPCams experience.
Subscribers of IPCams Pro get features such as:
• Multiple dashboards
• Larger dashboards (up to 9 cameras)
• Camera snapshots
• Custom app icons
• Custom accent colors
• Custom camera icons

What's new in IPCams 2.1:
• IPCams on Apple Watch
• IPCams on Macs with M1 Chip
• Option to disable SSL verification in settings
• Expanded grid option for dashboard
• Ability to force TCP stream for RTSP cameras

IPCams 2.4 is here and it is all about sharing! Here's whats new:
• IPCams Pro family plans - Check out the newly available Pro family plans to share with your family group
• Configuration import & export - Export and share your camera configuration data with others
• Various bug fixes and performance enhancements
